## Restock Recommendation

| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000                                  |
| Rationale                         | This order size, along with the current stock, covers the forecasted demand for 5 days with a safety margin. This approach allows for flexibility in adjustments based on actual sales and avoids stockouts while promoting efficient inventory management. |
